bio: Zachary Powell is a Sr Android Developer Advocate for Vonage. He has worked as an Android developer since 2009 starting out as a freelancer before switching to work for a company in 2018. During the pandemic he realised the thing he loved most about tech was educating others! Making the shift into DevRel at the start of 2021, the best decision he ever made!
name: Zachary Powell
title: Sr. Android Developer Advocate
